item.title: Develop Env in Container
item.description: Docker is very helpful when you need specific development environtment. Also if you don’t want your OS become “dirty” because too many package installed. For my case, I use docker container to isolate environment to develop golang application. Then I use vscode remote to do coding inside the container. Here how I setup my golang dev env. Dockerfile To create container containing golang, I use base image minideb from bitnami, that based on debian.
